basic.Peptide Name: R2 (Bac2A variant through single amino acid substitution)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=8 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=4 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=8 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=2 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=16 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=8 µg/ml).
